segments.text: Good , morning ! Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good morning.Could you tell me the times of trains to London , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes.There are trains at seven fifty-nine , nine eighteen , ten thirty-two and eleven fifty-five .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What time does the seven fifty-nine get to London ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: At nine thirty-six.And the nine eighteen gets to London at nine fifty-five , the ten thirty-two at eleven nine .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What about coming back ? I'd like to come back about 7 p . m .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There's one at nineteen and the next is at nineteen forty .
segments.speaker: S1
